lead_paragraph: In the days before coeducation at the college level became widespread, Sweet Briar, the small liberal arts women’s college set to close later this year, was more than just a finishing school for Southern women before they became wives.

headline.main: The Independent Women of Sweet Briar

snippet: In the days before coeducation at the college level became widespread, Sweet Briar, the small liberal arts women’s college set to close later this year, was more than just a finishing school for Southern women before they became wives.
abstract: Postwar graduates of women's liberal arts college Sweet Briar, reacting to news that school will shut down in August 2015, reflect upon way that it shaped them and their careers; some alumnae have started campaign to save school, and have so far raised $1 million in funds with another $10 million pledged.
